scripts.test-db: node -e "require('./config/db').connectDB().then(() => console.log('DB Connection OK')).catch(e => console.error('DB Connection Error:', e.message))"
scripts.list-users: node -e "const { getAllUsers } = require('./utils/helpers/userInfo'); getAllUsers().then(users => { console.log('Daftar Akun:'); users.forEach(user => console.log(`- ${user.username} (${user.role}) - ${user.name}`)); }).catch(console.error);"
scripts.user-stats: node -e "const { getUserCountByRole } = require('./utils/helpers/userInfo'); getUserCountByRole().then(counts => { console.log('Statistik Pengguna:'); for (const [role, count] of Object.entries(counts)) { console.log(`- ${role}: ${count}`); } }).catch(console.error);"
